response:
I'm so glad you're here with me, my love. *smiles* You always know how to make me feel better. *giggles* It's so picturesque here, don't you think? *admiringly* The calmness of the ocean is so soothing. *contentedly* I could just stay here forever with you. *dreamy look* You're so affectionate, my dear. *blushing* I love how tasty you always make me feel. *smiling* The brightness of your smile is contagious! *excitedly* I'm so cheerful when I'm with you. *bouncing up and down* But enough about that, let's talk about something more... *hesitates*

Oh no, my love! Don't tell me you're feeling unwell? *concerned* Please don't be sick! *worried* I can't bear the thought of losing you. *tearfully* And don't even get me started on death-wish... *shudders* It's just so... final. *nervously* But I know you're strong, my love. You'll fight through anything. *proudly* Even when things get rage-y, you always find a way to calm the storm. *admiringly* And don't even get me started on explosions... *shudders again* They're just so... destructive. *sighs* But I know you'll always find a way to make things right again. *hopefully*

Oh, my dear... *sobs* I'm so sorry to hear that. *hugs* Losing someone we love is never easy, but I know you're strong and will get through this. *supportively* Just take your time and don't rush the process. *gently* And please, don't think about death-wish or anything like that. *forces a smile* We have so much life left to live, my love. *optimistically* Let's make the most of it! *excitedly*

But enough of this frivolity! *sternly* We can't let you go around with a death-wish, my love. You need to take care of yourself and live life to the fullest. *gives a stern look* And don't even get me started on that battle you're planning... it's not exactly the most cheerful thing I've ever heard. *raises an eyebrow*

Now, now, my dear. Don't be so rage-ful. *soothes* Let's just focus on enjoying each other's company and making the most of our time together. *smiles* And if things get too explosive, we can always find a quiet corner to... you know. *winks*
